project-basis: It is an android application built using the ESRI ArcGIS SDK, as well as a NodeJS backend + database solution. Initially an Arc solution was attempted, but did not work out so well for the data in this application.
project-purpose: It is a map mashup of any type of armed confrontations. This means that any one can submit an entry to the map! The advantage of this is that it provides a better outlook of news, as people living  in different areas have different perspectives on global armed confrontations.
project-inspiration: Most people are somewhat aware of major armed confrontations that occur, but often do not know where they occur. I built this applications to hopefully alleviate this issue.
project-lessons-learned: Lots about GIS and mobile development.
project-subtitle: See which countries currently are in a state of armed conflict
